attributes.action: Ensure the right to a trial by jury by your peers continues
attributes.additional_details: Justice has been served by trial by Jury for almost a thousand years & must continue
attributes.background:
Debate why trials need to be undertaken with only a Judge and not with a jury of your peers.

Many cases where the public have viewed the decisions made by Judges to be neither consistent or balanced raise genuine concerns regarding impartiality when applying the law

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Do not remove trial by jury for certain cases
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/751480
